text: Manuhara babe e'ito bismayara bisaya neki ye, ami sihamtarae'i majara paraa ejanara ocarata ahi pathiya'icho ye, tumi manuhaka satarka karaa arau muminasakalaka susambada diya ye, sihamtara babe sihamtara pratipalakara ocarata ache ucca maryada. Kaphirasakale kaya, â€˜niscaya e'om ejana prakasya yadukaraâ€™
